display_long_description:
Unscrew VR is a cozy, physics-based puzzle game all about the strangely satisfying joy of unscrewing, disassembling, and taking things apart.
Inspired by the viral mobile “unscrew/disassembly” genre, this game brings that same tactile satisfaction into true VR form for the first time.

Relax, take your time, and enjoy the feeling of removing every screw, bolt, latch, and hidden mechanism as the toy slowly comes apart in your hands.

🧸 A Cozy Puzzle Experience With Two Full Worlds

Explore two complete environments, each with its own personality and set of toys to disassemble:

🔹 Kids Room – Bright, Warm & Playful

A relaxing space filled with colorful toys, friendly shapes, and gentle ambient sound. Great for newcomers or anyone wanting a stress-free, cozy VR moment.

🔹 Graveyard – Spooky… but Whimsical

A Tim-Burton-inspired nighttime world with jack-o'-lanterns, skeleton props, and playful Halloween charm. Lightly spooky in vibe only — still 100% cozy, non-horror, and suitable for all players.

(This seasonal world is included as part of the update — it adds atmosphere, not fear.)

🔧 24 Hand-Crafted Toys to Take Apart

Every toy is a small puzzle box:

Remove screws using realistic, tactile physics

Twist, pull, slide, and lift pieces

Continue peeling back layers until the entire toy comes apart

Enjoy ASMR-like sound and haptic feedback

Some objects hide “toys inside toys,” creating delightful little surprises — perfect for streamers or VR creators who love discovery
